author: Daniel Greene
description:
Meta’s AI caught red-handed, memorizing private documents, Isles of the Emberdark gets bumped up by Dragonsteel, A Chronicles of Narnia deluxe slipcase edition is coming, China arrests authors for writing fiction, Dark Souls voice legend Pik-Sem Lim has passed, David Lynch’s final project becomes a book, EA and Bioware exposed over the Dragon Age debacle, Willem Dafoe to star in A Christmas Carol directed by Robert Eggers, and yes, Spaceballs 2 is actually happening

Also: new titles from Adrian Tchaikovsky, MoeWanders, and Titan Books, plus YouTube ads get even worse.
